NKDA. he is a white male dog walker aged 35 years. o:Height 74 in, Weight 171 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 15, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

s:a 36 year old male presents with mild fever. he has history of mild cough. he denies smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 74 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered Chest X-Ray.
